title: Season 6 - The Season Bads Ascend.
body: Never do I walk into a game saying, "Okay time for me to carry all my crappy teammates cause I'm so good lel". Nah, it's a team game. But how ONE teammate can ruin it for every one is beyond me. I curse the Koreans or whoever it was that made tank Akali a thing. (When the enemy does it, it's great, when my team does it though..) Obviously if I was that fed I could have done something to prevent the lost, but when your team huddles together to die I can't Life Grip them. Anyways rant end--it's just a rant. Not asking for anything. Just pissed. Pls no one get triggered, if you do, you're probably a tank Akali mid-main. Season 6 is by far the least efficient out of all the seasons.

replies.body: They didn't even build it right ;-;
What are you even talking about?  Am I missing something?  Akali was 8/11/11...worst of your life tho?
Do you see those deaths LOL she fed the fish and we all know once the fish is fed that s***'s not a fish anymore it's a shark
Worst of your life though?  You've never seen 0/20?  A little on the dramatic side.
Yes worse of my life considering how hard I tried that game and she was the reason we lost.

Step one to solve your problem.

Pick any random CC mage.
Find a fun-loving teemo player.
Queue jungle.
Go duo top with teemo, ignite/exhaust.

Watch the enemy team be so confused they dont know how to react, let teemo steal easy kills, get fed as shit, and dominate.

Meta is just an excuse used by bad players to complain when someone does badly.

Lol. Cause someone doing badly is justifiable. 
I used to hate the meta, but you gotta learn the rules before you break them. :)
